name: Design a Mars Rover
description:
There is so much to find out about other planets and fitting all the necessary scientific instruments to gather information on other planets onto a Rover (a robot that goes to space) is a tricky challenge – play our game to design your own Rover. 

The aim of the game is to build a virtual model of a Space Rover for different missions – once you've completed your design watch them launch to Mars and drive them around the planet.

When designing a Rover engineers have to make tricky decisions about what to include as there is always a limited cost and, as the Rover has to be launched into space, there is a mass limit as well. Engineers have to collaborate to agree on what to include as well as work together to make all the components lighter and lower cost.

Find out more on https://www.letsdoengineering.com/activities/space-rover-design-app and meet Sara, a real-life engineer working on the ExoMars mission.
